suite.name: Headers Params Auth

kw.name: Conectar com autenticação por token na API do GitHub
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mygithubAuth, url=https://api.github.com, headers={'Authorization': 'Bearer coloqueSeuTokenAqui'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Solicitar os dados do meu usuário
Get Request
kw.msg: Keyword 'RequestsLibrary.Get Request' is deprecated. Please use `GET On Session` instead.

GET Request : url=https://api.github.com/user path_url=/user headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.5', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Bearer coloqueSeuTokenAqui'} body=None

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.

suite.doc: Exemplos da própria Library: https://github.com/bulkan/robotframework-requests/blob/master/tests/testcase.robot Doc da API do GitHub: https://developer.github.com/v3/
